title: SQL 练习 11 - 获取所有员工当前的 manager
slug: 2021-04-09-SQL 练习 11 - 获取所有员工当前的 manager
path: api/articles/2021-04-09-SQL 练习 11 - 获取所有员工当前的 manager.json
content:
题目

题目链接：获取所有员工当前的manager

有一个员工表 dept_emp 简况如下：

mysql> select * from dept_emp;
+--------+---------+------------+------------+
| emp_no | dept_no | from_date  | to_date    |
+--------+---------+------------+------------+
|  10001 | d001    | 1986-06-26 | 9999-01-01 |
|  10002 | d001    | 1996-08-03 | 9999-01-01 |
|  10003 | d002    | 1995-12-03 | 9999-01-01 |
+--------+---------+------------+------------+

第一行表示为员工编号为 10001 的部门是 d001 部门。

有一个部门经理表 dept_manager 简况如下：

mysql> select * from dept_manager;
+---------+--------+------------+------------+
| dept_no | emp_no | from_date  | to_date    |
+---------+--------+------------+------------+
| d001    |  10002 | 1996-08-03 | 9999-01-01 |
| d002    |  10003 | 1990-08-05 | 9999-01-01 |
+---------+--------+------------+------------+
2 rows in set (0.03 sec)

第一行表示为 d001 部门的经理是编号为 10002 的员工。

建表及插入数据语句如下：

CREATE TABLE `dept_emp`
(
    `emp_no`    int(11)     NOT NULL,
    `dept_no`   varchar(16) NOT NULL,
    `from_date` date        NOT NULL,
    `to_date`   date        NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (`emp_no`)
);

INSERT INTO `dept_emp`
VALUES (10001, 'd001', '1986-06-26', '9999-01-01');
INSERT INTO `dept_emp`
VALUES (10002, 'd001', '1996-08-03', '9999-01-01');
INSERT INTO `dept_emp`
VALUES (10003, 'd002', '1995-12-03', '9999-01-01');

CREATE TABLE `dept_manager`
(
    `dept_no`   varchar(16) NOT NULL,
    `emp_no`    int(11)     NOT NULL,
    `from_date` date        NOT NULL,
    `to_date`   date        NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (`dept_no`)
);

INSERT INTO `dept_manager`
VALUES ('d001', 10002, '1996-08-03', '9999-01-01');
INSERT INTO `dept_manager`
VALUES ('d002', 10003, '1990-08-05', '9999-01-01');

获取所有的员工和员工对应的经理，如果员工本身是经理的话则不显示，以上例子如下：

+--------+---------+
| emp_no | manager |
+--------+---------+
|  10001 |   10002 |
+--------+---------+
1 row in set (0.02 sec)

代码

select de.emp_no as emp_no, dm.emp_no as manager
from dept_emp as de
         inner join dept_manager as dm
                    on de.dept_no = dm.dept_no
where de.to_date = '9999-01-01'
  and dm.to_date = '9999-01-01'
  and de.emp_no <> dm.emp_no;

执行结果：

mysql> select de.emp_no as emp_no, dm.emp_no as manager
    -> from dept_emp as de
    ->          inner join dept_manager as dm
    ->                     on de.dept_no = dm.dept_no
    -> where de.to_date = '9999-01-01'
    ->   and dm.to_date = '9999-01-01'
    ->   and de.emp_no <> dm.emp_no;
+--------+---------+
| emp_no | manager |
+--------+---------+
|  10001 |   10002 |
+--------+---------+
1 row in set (0.02 sec)
